mapper.insert: insert into sys_video (video_img_url, video_name, video_url, video_detail, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_it, year, video_group,del_flag) values (#{videoImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delIt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update sys_video set video_img_url = #{videoImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_detail = #{videoDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, del_it = #{delIt,jdbcType=CHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_group = #{videoGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, video_img_url, video_name, video_url, video_detail, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_it, year,video_group,del_flag from sys_video where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_video (video_img_url, video_name, video_url, video_detail, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_it, year,video_group,del_flag) values (#{videoImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delIt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, video_img_url, video_name, video_url, video_detail, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_it, year,video_group,del_flag from sys_video where year = #{year} and del_flag = #{delFlag}
select distinct year from sys_video order by year desc

select id, video_img_url, video_name, video_url, video_detail, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_it, year, video_group,del_flag from sys_video where video_group = #{videoGroup} and del_flag = #{delFlag}
